post.body: LOL - gleefully watching KLVJ AWOS with anticipation . . . . . :)
LMAO!!
@mellowynk no snow at my office near greenway either. thinking of heading to midtown but tfc is a mess I'm sure
where are you?
LOL . . . shows the ice age cometh, a product of GW :)
what letters are those? what is @eschipul? I'm curious . . . I'm an INTP (weak I, strong N, mid T and P) on MB type II inv.
Wx shouldn't affect your flight to Houston unless your plane is delayed elsewhere.
Oui! Vous avez entendu moi!
right but second def also defines hail. snow is very distinct. there is also snow pellets, which often r b4 snow (maybe this)
hey I'm not :) want to see it as much as everyone. Just don't think we'll have real snow (not wintry mix/frozen precip) until ...
take a pic of it on a dark surface, such as a car
LOL! that's awesome ;)
hell no. it's a good day! :)
really? it's something to behold, esp hardest hit neighborhoods. been there for 2 jazzfests following volunteering
app is opensource; code is on svn. I'll d/l and try and modify it to do what I want and submit back to developers
as we say in the biz: RTFM!!!
mmm actually doesn't do what I want. Love concept but *only* want notifications for @replies or search string.
perfect. installed. let's see how it goes. thanks!
hah!! Wow. isn't that built-in? Sheesh.
just using twitter mobile web, or the full site if I need it for that. thinking of d/l android SDK and taking a stab myself tho
u can move chat and labels to the right, but you can't move them around if you do. "navbar drag and drop" is what you want
yes there's a labs setting for that, though it only works with widgets on the left side iirc
how is the new version? I nuked that app long ago; so buggy and a hog and poor usability imho.
yeah which ever is not being hijacked for warez and bittorrent ;)
either should work but I use coffee groundz
ah! *that's* why the TFR NOTAM was issued there. I was curious about what he was doing. dunno seems lame of A&M if u ask me
are we talking rotary wing aircraft or 2 wheel street vehicles? clearly the former is more impressive
try take out taxi!
neither webex nor gotomeeting support linux, which is ridiculous since they can run on a Java VM
what don't you like about nano? I use it in a very specific manner which works perfectly. Perhaps I'll write a brief post.
looks like you made it without any problems. Welcome again to Houston!
so depending on your aircraft, it could pose a problem or not. what flight #?
forecast for KDEN shows 600 ft overcast and < 1 mi visibility from midnight tonight til morning, thren becoming partly sunny.
i was going to say, 190GB? holy hell!! ;)
bah! usual wx man hedging bets with *very* widely scattered showers. odds are greater than 4 to 1 you won't see rain wed forward
dude! you're a traveling fool! just sayin'
not at all! we'll be beachcombing by week's end ;)
today: colder than fuck. tom: cold as fuck: wed: less cold but still very cool. thurs: beach weather ;)
when are you here? i'll give you my expert prognostications ;)
we don't get it either, don't worry ;)
tell them you'll trade the house for a gulfstream :)
lol yeah I do this ever year for both days. I find it sporting ;)
yes indeed!
true that. treying @wholefoods on kirby first
update: Hobby airport AWOS showing snow! IAH showing mix of snow and rain. Lake Jackson airport showing snow. DWH stopped, CXO and SGR still
JUST IN: KSGR showing snow on the AWOS (sugar land)
we're getting more ASOS reports of Snow: CXO (conroe), UTS (Huntsville), and still DWH. I'll report more as they come in.
That last observation was taken at David Wayne Hooks airport, near Champions Forest, BTW. Still no other reports yet.
Aha!! Ok it's official, ladies and gents: KDWH 102153Z AUTO 33008KT 4SM -SN (the SN means snow, the minus means light). w00t!!
frozen precip/rain is snow that melts as it falls. snow is ice crystal aggregates that form in colder air as they fall and don't change
sleet = snow that melts through warm air and refreezes at lower colder layers
ASOSs all still show freezing precip. HUGE diff between snow and freezing precip. Just sayin.
and a day later I'm still fraking around with the ridiculously obfuscated godaddy SSL cert process. holy jebus!
polo/sbux parking lot full. parked in valet "reserved" spaces but no tow away notice. I dared him to threaten me. He didn't. smart. ;)
enjoying my #5 whataburger with a 90 minute dogfish heads ipa because that's how I roll
This is Saute which isn't yet in brightkite. - http://bkite.com/02VCs
holy christ! 6 FF tabs open with godaddy and I still don't have my SSL cert! Refreshed 5 times and had to relogin once. MASSIVE FAIL
work work work. filling out new health insurance app. digging nanotweet on the G1; have shut off all SMS notifications as a result. Coffee.
barnaby's jalapeno blue cheese burger, fries, big ass salad, 90 minute DFH ipa + heat = heaven :)
holy crap it's not a good time for shorts ansd flip flops downtown!!!! brrrrrr
update: office has finally turned heat on, as evidenced by the smell of burning dust particles
why does my fraking office building have the a/c running full blast? damn!
nice visit with @magsmac and her bf who were at el patio across the st. now hummus wrap and decaf latte at oc then bed. busy monday in store
note: whataburger is closed. 59 diner is open.
chillaxing with @tiffrg having a rocky patel robusto and petite petit talking about twitter
thanks for the awesome compliments! happy holidays everyone!
mother's request #2 denied- unfortunately the 3" gained in my waistline will not accommodate fancy threads. it's coming off in 2009 though!
http://twitpic.com/w252 - Clean shave ftw!
doing a clean shave for the first time since 2007. special request by my mother :)
kroger fail. getting chipotle in adobo as hedge. is there a run on dried chipotles? usually everywhere year 'round. done this doz. of times
whole foods chipotle fail. going to kroger @askdrding recomm. usually have bins full of them but not since I moved
one word describes @wholefoods parking lot: clusterf*ck
literally 10 lbs of produce including 5 lbs of avocados for $20. that would have required a mortgage at central market ;)
leaving fiesta to hunt for dried chipotle chiles at kroger and randall's. what's wrong with this picture?
Mini habanero chiles - Photo: http://bkite.com/03cxI
every dried chile here: arbol, guajillo, ancho, cascasbel but no chipotle (which I came for).
about to brave the grocery store to shop for tomorrow's culinary creations
watching the met-rx strongest man competiton and musing anyone grasping basic laws of physics could trump these guys
. . . and a corollary to that is a 172 will get there before you car, no matter the price
"your car, no matter how expensive, will never beat mine to the destination. a citation X, however, will get there hours before your 172."
